messages.message: has anyone had issues with getting application/octet-stream to work in dev? I'm having trouble reproducing the cluster issues locally because my webapp seems to not read from the stream. @Jessica or @Eric Han
ok confirmed with @Aaron Vontell that it doesn't work in dev -- who was the last person to work on cluster.py?
I am not familiar with that code but if it’s looking like a front end issue let me know and I’ll take a look
I know that I’ve been able to read protos directly from application/octet-stream before and decode it on the front end. AjaxAsync’s makeRequest method might be a good reference for front end code

hey! chatted with @dlluncor and the issue is in dev we use the webapp as a proxy to  requests from api-server-apps, but it doesn't handle streaming requests. @Eric Han was your endpoint also in api-server-apps? puzzling that that worked
it could be I was reading directly from the drive api which I think is not in api-server-apps
